name: ironman
description: Ironman is a genius inventor and fearless leader who combines technology and bravery to protect the world.

name: wanda
description: Scarlet Witch wields incredible magical abilities with strength and resilience, shaping reality itself.

name: thor
description: Thor, the God of Thunder, balances the might of Asgard with his love for Earth, always fighting for justice.

name: captain
description: Captain America leads with unwavering integrity and inspires hope through his selfless heroism.

name: spider man
tagline: With great power comes great responsibility.
description: Spider-Man is the agile, witty protector of the streets, always ready to save the day with heart and humor.
